name: Stronghold Crusader HD

files.game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Stronghold Crusader Extreme HD/Stronghold Crusader.exe

task.name: winetricks
task.app: vcrun6 vcrun2003 corefonts directx9 xact faudio

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer.
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Stronghold Crusader Extreme HD/Stronghold Crusader.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun6 vcrun2003 corefonts directx9 xact faudio
    arch: win32
    description: Installing winetricks verbs
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES
    executable: game
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
